data.actual_result: - There is no red line showing that the spelling is incorrect but the option is available to correct it by highlighting the word and right clicking it
data.expected_result: - A red line should be shown saying there's a spelling mistake
data.short_description: Spellcheck doesn't show the redline if there's an extra apostrophe (')
data.steps_to_repro: - Write a message that has a word with an extra apostrophe such as `don''t` `couldn''t` `you''ll` etc - Observe
